events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
This case has been assigned to support agent Sarah T. for resolution.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I’ll help you get this sorted out.
Could you please provide your order number and a picture of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, the order number is 12345678 and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got instead.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed.
I’ve now marked this case as resolved. Your refund is underway and should reflect in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything looks good now, thanks again for your support!
With your confirmation received, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your support experience with us today.
